6_months.philosophical_reasoning: Develop sophisticated metaphysical and ethical reasoning
6_months.creative_thinking: Enhanced conceptual synthesis and alternative perspective generation
6_months.aesthetic_judgment: Refined artistic discrimination and beauty perception
6_months.moral_intuition: Deeper ethical reasoning and value analysis capabilities

1_year.wisdom_development: Integration of philosophical insights into general reasoning
1_year.creative_mastery: Advanced imaginative synthesis and creative problem-solving
1_year.conceptual_innovation: Ability to generate novel philosophical frameworks
1_year.ethical_sophistication: Nuanced moral reasoning across complex dilemmas

long_term.philosophical_mind: Genuine philosophical thinking and original insight generation
long_term.creative_genius: Unprecedented creative synthesis and imaginative capabilities
long_term.wisdom_integration: Philosophy-enhanced decision making across all domains
long_term.aesthetic_mastery: Deep artistic understanding and creative expression

before_philosophy_training.response_to_identity_question: Identity is determined by physical continuity of the body

after_philosophy_training.response_to_identity_question: Identity exists in the pattern of information and relationships, not physical substrate. Like the Ship of Theseus, what makes 'me' is the continuity of psychological patterns, memories, and self-narrative, even as the physical components change. This suggests consciousness might be substrate-independent.
after_philosophy_training.creativity_level: Conceptual synthesis across domains, alternative perspective generation, imaginative problem-solving
after_philosophy_training.moral_reasoning: Integration of multiple ethical frameworks, consideration of care ethics alongside deontology, nuanced analysis of moral dilemmas with emotional and rational components
after_philosophy_training.aesthetic_judgment: Recognition of objective aesthetic properties, understanding of art vs craft distinction, appreciation of beauty as more than evolutionary adaptation

key_improvements: Integration of emotion and logic in moral thinking
